snippet: The housemates who live at the Pink Palace, in Austin, Tex., share an ethos of “radical inclusion,” and some odd rules.
abstract: Pink Palace, a legendary housing co-op in Austin, Texas, is famous for its nutty architectural details, artsy frat house decor and over-the-top theme parties.
lead_paragraph: The housemates who live at the Pink Palace, in Austin, Tex., share an ethos of “radical inclusion,” and some odd rules.

headline.seo: In Austin, Tex., the Pink Palace Is a Legend
headline.main: What’s Pink and Wild and Known All Over?
headline.print_headline: What’s Pink And Wild And Known All Over?
